bill.summary: 1/20/2011--Introduced. Disapproves and nullifies the rule submitted by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) relating to "Approval and Promulgation of Implementation Plans; Texas; Revisions to the New Source Review (NSR) State Implementation Plan (SIP); Flexible Permits; Final Rule" that was published on July 15, 2010.
